pages.text: Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “Chisimu une nguntetela wanganyammwe ni malowe (ga Allah).” Nambo asiiwa nganawa apikene m’bilango, (namuno) achiteteledwaga
Nambo kalikatite kaakwaye kambungo kaipotesi ya Ambuje wenu, chisimu chene mpaka ajile: “Ipotesi yetuwe! Chisimu uwwe twaliji waalitenda lupuso.”

Ni tuchiwika masikelo gachilungamiko pa lisiku lya Kiyama, basi mundu jwalijose ngasatendedwa lupuso pachilichose, natamuno (chinducho) chichiwe chausito wati mpela lupele lwa mbumbi (tanaposi), tuchiika nacho; soni Uwwe tukwanila kuwa Akuwalanjila
Soni chisimu chene Uwwe twampele Musa ni Haruna (Chitabu), chakulekanganya (chilikati cha yakuona ni yaunami, chachaliji) soni lumuli ni chikumbusyo kwa wandu wawoga (wakun’jogopa Allah)
Awala waakun’jogopa M’mbuje gwao mwangali kum’bona, soni wanyao Kiyama akasajijogopaga
Sano aji (Qur’an) ni chikumbusyo chaupile chatuchitulwisye; ana jenumanja chalakwechi ni nkuchikana
Soni chisimu chene Uwwe twampele Ibrahima chongoko chakwe kala (kuuchanda), nitwaliji nkummanya chenene
Pandema jawawechete kwa babagwe ni wandu wakwe kuti: “Ana niyapi ayi isanamu yankuwa jenumanja nchijendelechelaga kuigalagatila?”
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Chisimu chene jenumanja ni achatati wenu m’bele mukusokonechela kwakuonechela.”
Wanganyao watite: “Ana ntuwichilile niyakuona kapena n’di mwa akutenda chanache?”
Jwalakwe jwatite: “(Ngwamba), nambo m’mbuje gwenu ni M’mbuje jwa kumawunde ni petaka Ajula juwaigumbile yalakweyo, soni une payalakweyo ndili mwa akutendela umboni.”
“Soni ngunnumbila Allah! Chisimu une chindende malindi (gakuijonanga) isanamu yenu panyuma pagalauka ni kulosya migongo jenu (kwaulaga kwakuja kwenu).”
